sources.title: 100 Feet | Full Movie | Tense Mystery Horror | Famke Janssen
sources.description:
Five years ago, Marnie killed her abusive husband, Mike, in self-defense. Convicted of murder, sheâ€™s released from prison early. For the next three years, Marnie is confined to house arrest. Marnie is prepared to stay on her 100-foot electronic leash and make the best of it. What she didnâ€™t count on was Mike coming back â€¦ as an enraged and violent spirit, bent on revenge.

metadata.Plot: A young woman, Marnie Watson, is granted early release from her prison sentence for manslaughter (killing her husband - a violent NYC cop - in self defense) on condition she wear an electronic ankle bracelet and remain within her home, effectively under house arrest, for the remainder of her sentence. Her late husband's partner keeps tabs on her from a patrol car parked across the street, hoping she'll violate probation and he can send her back to prison. But the 100-foot radius her ankle bracelet allows isn't the worst of her problems. Her dead husband --now a malevolent ghost--is still in the house, where he died -- intent on savage revenge.
metadata.Actors: Famke Janssen, Bobby Cannavale, Ed Westwick
